languages.text: "Когда логис Адептус Механикус желает куда-то направиться, мы не спрашиваем зачем, Ваша Светлость".
"When a Logis of the Adeptus Mechanicus wants to go somewhere, we don't ask why, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."
languages.original_text: "Когда логис Адептус Механикус желает куда-то направиться, мы не спрашиваем зачем, Ваша Светлость".

traits.locale_text: "When a logis of the Adeptus Mechanicus wants to go somewhere, we don't ask why, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."
"When a logis of the Adeptus Mechanicus wants to go somewhere, we don't ask why, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."
"When a logis of the Adeptus Mechanicus wants to go somewhere, we don't ask why, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."
"When a logis of the Adeptus Mechanicus wants to go somewhere, we don't ask why, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."
"When a Logis of the Adeptus Mechanicus wants to go somewhere, we don't ask why, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."
"When a Logis of the Adeptus Mechanicus wants to go somewhere, we don't ask why, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

languages.text: "Wenn ein Logis des Adeptus Mechanicus einen bestimmten Ort besuchen will, dann fragen wir nicht warum, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft."
languages.original_text: "When a Logis of the Adeptus Mechanicus wants to go somewhere, we don't ask why, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn ein Logis des Adeptus Mechanicus einen bestimmten Ort besuchen will, dann fragen wir nicht warum, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft."

languages.text: « Quand un logis de l'Adeptus Mechanicus souhaite se rendre quelque part, on ne lui demande pas d'explication, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: "When a Logis of the Adeptus Mechanicus wants to go somewhere, we don't ask why, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: « Quand un logis de l'Adeptus Mechanicus souhaite se rendre quelque part, on ne lui demande pas d'explication, Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: “无论机械修会的逻辑士想去什么地方，我们都不会过问原因，大人。”
languages.original_text: "When a Logis of the Adeptus Mechanicus wants to go somewhere, we don't ask why, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: “无论机械修会的逻辑士想去什么地方，我们都不会过问原因，大人。”

languages.text: 「帝国技術局の論理学者がどこかに行きたいと言えば、こちらから理由を聞くことはないのだ、陛下」
languages.original_text: "When a Logis of the Adeptus Mechanicus wants to go somewhere, we don't ask why, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国技術局の論理学者がどこかに行きたいと言えば、こちらから理由を聞くことはないのだ、陛下」

languages.text: «Cuando un logos del Adeptus Mechanicus quiere ir a algún sitio, no preguntamos por qué, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: "When a Logis of the Adeptus Mechanicus wants to go somewhere, we don't ask why, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando un logos del Adeptus Mechanicus quiere ir a algún sitio, no preguntamos por qué, mi{mf|lord|lady}».

languages.text: "Bir Adeptus Mechanicus Logis'i bir yerlere gitmek istiyorsa sebebini sormayız {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: "When a Logis of the Adeptus Mechanicus wants to go somewhere, we don't ask why, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

traits.locale_text: "Bir Adeptus Mechanicus Logis'i bir yerlere gitmek istiyorsa sebebini sormayız {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
